reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 3 year old. He walks around with it all day and it hits things but no problem as yet. I love how you can set it up to stand on its own. The kids mode is overflowing with learning entertainment. Perfect for kids.UPDATE:It is coming on but nothing on the screen. The screen lights up but you cannot see anything. Therefore, it is definitely not durable!!! He had it for maybe 4 days total. I'm really disappointed.

reviews.reviewerName: The product was like the one on the pick it was a present for my grandson hi ope he likes it
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after 2 months
reviews.reviewText: The tablet was great at first but stopped working after 2 months. Ofcourse Amazon refuses to issue a refund up return and the seller is giving me the run around about getting it replaced saying I have to pay international shipping for a defective product. The screen flickers on and off and over heats if you manually turn the tablet off. It’s clearly a defective product that I wasted my hard earned money on. Would not recommend simply because the customer service is trash.
